channel.title: CVE Feed for Kriesi -- Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kriesi -- Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme

item.title: CVE-2024-5061|2024-08-30T03:24:15.330Z -- kriesi -- enfold%20-%20responsive%20multi-purpose%20theme
item.description: The Enfold - Responsive Multi-Purpose Theme theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘wrapper_class’ and 'class' parameters in all versions up to, and including, 6.0.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
